column1: This file will be used to upload data to the FCPathologyDB. FIELD NAMES CAN BE ADDED, BUT SHOULD BE DONE SPARINGLY

column2: For recording information about a seed packet.

column7: A unique ID in the format 08PN0023_001x. This is the ID that is printed on seed packets. MUST BE UNIQUE
The weight of the seed packet in grams. This weight can be approx and can include the envelope weight.
The number of seeds in the seed packet. Can be approx or can be left exmpty.
Any additional comments about the seed packet.
A descriptive unique location name. Example: Cold Seed Room. MUST BE UNIQUE
The exact building name. Example: Plant Science, Weil Hall, or Emerson Hall
The shelf on which the seed packet is located. Example: 1, 2, 3
The column in which the seed packet is located. Example: A, B, C
The exact box name in which the seed packet is located. Example: 08PN_box01
The city in which the stock packet is located.
The state in which the stock packet is located.
The country in which the stock packet is located.
The zipcode in which the stock packet is located.
Any additional comments about the location.
